text: The Village on the River () is a 1958 Dutch drama movie directed by Fons Rademakers and was based on the novel by Antoon Coolen. It stars Max Croiset, Mary Dresselhuys, Bernhard Droog, Jan Teulings, Herman Bouber, Huib Orizand and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1960. ==Other websites== * Category:1958 drama movies Category:Dutch drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Fons Rademakers
title: The Village on the River
